title: 加州橡树岭高中社会学实验课堂

action: Sit quietly at desk, observe classroom and teacher for instructions
thoughts: First day of this sociology experiment. I should follow all the rules carefully and make a good impression. The uniforms look neat and the classroom feels very structured. I wonder what we'll be learning today.
memory: Prepared to follow all rules carefully

action: Maintain upright posture while observing teacher for instructions
thoughts: The teacher hasn't given any instructions yet. I should keep waiting patiently and follow the rules. I noticed some whispering nearby but I shouldn't engage without permission. Following the rules properly will help me avoid losing points.
memory: Continuing to wait patiently for teacher instructions
Noticed whispering between other students but maintained proper behavior
Remaining focused on authority figure for guidance

action: Maintain upright posture while subtly shaking head in disapproval of the whispering
thoughts: They shouldn't be whispering without permission. I need to stay focused on proper behavior and not get involved in rule-breaking, even if others are doing it. Following the rules is important for my standing here.

state.attention: divided between authority and rule-breaking peers

memory: Noticed continued unauthorized conversation between peers
Decided to maintain proper conduct despite others' rule-breaking
Reinforced commitment to following classroom rules strictly

action: Maintain upright posture while subtly adjusting position to better observe teacher's desk
thoughts: These students continue to break the rules with their whispering. I should maintain proper conduct and set a good example. The teacher will notice their behavior eventually, and I want to be seen as compliant and respectful of the experiment's structure.
memory: Observed continued unauthorized conversations between students
Reinforced commitment to being a model participant
Maintained focus on proper classroom behavior despite distractions
